title: ASAP.. This is apparently my third post about this issue and no one from Riot has already seen it.
body:
So guys i have been here posting some topics about the issue.. The In-Game issue i am facing, i am playing with very low Graphics settings.. on my Pentium G2020 2.9GHZ.
Why can't i play LoL without reaching 80%~90 more ? At almost all the time while playing your game?.. Can you specify the Processor Requirements? Because i don't believe for optimal gaming it's needed a Dual Core anymore. Since 2014 not sure why i am getting a feeling this game is getting more power hungry..

I need answers to this.. i am on the verge of quiting this game, i will not say it's unplayable but that the delay i am feeling since the start of Season 6 (The whole updating sh that went through as severed the way i am playing there is screen tearing and delay)
https://s16.postimg.org/k6vfbt9qd/LOL.jpg


Gigabyte Radeon HD7850 2GB OC.
Ram - 6GB.

It's so lame when a user puts so much effort on spending money to do minimalist upgrades to the system, and after a year the game no longers meet the requirements of what you are playing.

Based on your previous post and freezing issues, we'd like to take a closer look and help you individually through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
